item.description:
Hi fellow rockers and dancers....Rock City Band is a great rock 'n roll band, and I probably won't make dinner, at 7:30, but for those of you who do, indicate so in your reply, so others will know, and please save as many seats as you can, bring a meetup sign if you have one. I might be there by 8pm, even though I'm not eating.
My biggest problem with Princeton Station is that they won't do separate checks, so that's a BIG turnoff to me. The positive to PS is that they never charge a cover.

The "Rock City Band" really plays great music, and dress is casual, if you like. check'm out at www.rockcityband.com

If you get there by 8pm, I'll be happy to introduce you to everyone, but once the band starts at 9pm, you're on your own, because I'll be on the dance floor I will of course have meetup signs, so you'll know where we are.

see you then,
suz

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Let's rock to "Rock City Band" at Princeton Station
